description: Introductory study of selected topics in physics in a full-semester format. Topics are chosen to engage students in physics based on available staff. Offered periodically during spring semester. Potential topics include quantum computing, astrophysics and the physics of energy.
name: Top: Fascinating World of Quantum
notes: Students that have taken or are currently taking PHYS 244 are not eligible to
take this course. Open only to first-years and a limited number of sophomores.
Full topic title: The Fascinating World of Quantum (Mechanics and Computing)
Students that have taken or are currently taking PHYS 244 are not eligible to
Open only to first-year and sophomore students.
